page.title: 12INDUSTRY-THE OLD DOCKS
page.content: There is a lot of waste ground, abandoned and derelict workshops and warehouses.The roads are unfenced and unlit.There are disused railway lines,broken-down fences,old air raid shelters,a disused anchor and other things lying about. There are very few workshops now in use.We found three men sawing wood and one group of contractors assembling a dredger,working .When the weather is bad the men have to wear special clothing.The docks are now used mainly for supplying materials to the Morecambe Bay gas field.There is a large fenced,floodlit area with many large pieces of pipe,cable and lots of bits and pieces. British Nuclear Fuels ltd also have a
